summary: This bill, H.R. 5174, proposes revisions and technical amendments to Title 51 of the United States Code. The primary aims are to update the title's currency, incorporate recently enacted laws, and correct technical errors. Key changes include adjustments to chapter headings, revisions to specific sections related to NASA, the establishment of new programs (e.g., Commercial Crew Program, STEM education support), updates to definitions, and the provision for space exploration initiatives. The amendments also modify committee name references and repeal outdated provisions.
